Class NodeState

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Models
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Default implementation of INodeState using ObservableBase. Provides framework-agnostic property change notification with no external dependencies.

public class NodeState : ObservableBase, INodeState, INotifyPropertyChanged

Remarks

For Avalonia applications, consider using ObservableNodeState from FlowGraph.Avalonia which uses source generators for better performance.

Properties

Height

The height of the node. Null means auto-sized based on content.

public double? Height { get; set; }

Property Value

double?

IsCollapsed

Whether a group node is collapsed (only meaningful when IsGroup is true).

public bool IsCollapsed { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsDragging

Whether this node is currently being dragged.

public bool IsDragging { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsHighlighted

Whether this node is highlighted for emphasis (e.g., search results, analysis feedback). Unlike selection, highlighting is purely visual and doesn't affect operations.

public bool IsHighlighted { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsSelected

Whether this node is currently selected.

public bool IsSelected { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsVisible

Whether this node is visible in the canvas. Invisible nodes are not rendered but remain in the graph.

public bool IsVisible { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Width

The width of the node. Null means auto-sized based on content.

public double? Width { get; set; }

Property Value

double?

X

The X coordinate of the node in canvas space.

public double X { get; set; }

Property Value

double

Y

The Y coordinate of the node in canvas space.

public double Y { get; set; }

Property Value

double

ZIndex

Z-index for rendering order. Higher values render on top. Default is CanvasElement.ZIndexNodes (300).

public int ZIndex { get; set; }

Property Value

int
